"Vasco": "Oh yes, this place is a perfect view."
"A perfect view of what, you ask?"
"Up! Look up and to the southeast! That giant floating structure in the sky is what I wanted to get a better look at."
"Not a single soul knows what it could be."
"Since anyone can remember, researchers have called it the \"Floating Island\"."
"It's been an object of study since long before our time, and yet nobody was able to shed any light as to what purpose it serves."
"With our technology, we're unable to reach that high up in the sky. So that's why I wanted you to come here: to be as close as possible."
"Ah, your Mag has finished its data collection."
"Thank you very much. Please return to the camp when you can."
